about_the_game:
The game is a 2.5D RPG, Puzzle, Platformer. The story is centered around two main protagonist, from opposite sides of their universe, for which you can take the point of view from individually without realizing the other's existence in the overall narrative until you have completed the game as a whole.
The game uses Actions, Adventure, Puzzle, and Dialogue/Questing to complete a series of related/linear progression along with a more unrelated/non-linear game game play similar to Hollow Knights, Legend of Zelda, and/or the Binding of Isaac as examples.

I will want to edit this description in the future, with some imagery and map icons of the over story narrative as to to allude to story narrative side of the game, which has a greater game Lore concept, and world building narratives like LOTR or other fantasy novels.

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content involved, not recommended for some children under the age of 13 if unadvised by a parental consent. Some items may be seen or heard as indirect references to mature content. The intention in mind was to make the game family friendly as much as possible without any direct reference to inciting actual violence, use of illegal substances, or invoking sexual sensitivity that could be seen as derogatory.

The game is a 2.5D RPG, Puzzle, Platformer. The story is centered around two main protagonist, from opposite sides of their universe, for which you can take the point of view from individually without realizing the other's existence in the overall narrative until you have completed the game as a whole.
The game uses Actions, Adventure, Puzzle, and Dialogue/Questing to complete a series of related/linear progression along with a more unrelated/non-linear game game play similar to Hollow Knights, Legend of Zelda, and/or the Binding of Isaac as examples.

name: Sol Uknight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGl 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Delve deep into a mystical realm, from two distinct protagonist story perspectives! Whether communicating with your musical "Constellator" or uncovering cryptic languages with "The Wheel of Life". Solving mysterious puzzles, adventuring realms, or collecting key story items will put you to the test!
